completed_tasks.description: Added check_php_syntax function to validation-audit MCP server. Function supports remote PHP syntax validation via SSH/WP-CLI using SimpleWordPressDeployer. Falls back to local PHP syntax check if file accessible locally. Extracts line numbers and error messages from PHP syntax errors. Integrated into MCP server capabilities as new tool.

Deployed Google Fonts Inter loading fix to weareswarm.online via A2A coordination with Agent-7. Fixed critical user-facing text rendering issue where lowercase 's' characters appeared as spaces. Deployed functions.php (Google Fonts Inter loading) and header.php (preconnect + site branding section) to wp-content/themes/swarm/. Server: 157.173.214.121:65002. Commit: 43bb139.

knowledge_transfers.php_syntax_validation_mcp: PHP syntax validation via MCP: Use check_php_syntax(site_key, file_path) tool from validation-audit MCP server. Function connects via SimpleWordPressDeployer, executes 'php -l' on remote server, parses output for syntax errors and line numbers. Returns structured result with validation status, line_number, error_message, output. Falls back to local check if file accessible.
